mapper.insert: insert /* BackUpDao.backupApi */ into api_h /* API_변경이력 */ ( hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , api_id /* varchar_API_ID */ , api_tp /* varchar_API_타입 */ , api_nm /* varchar_API_이름 */ , api_desc /* text_API_설명 */ , host /* varchar_host */ , ip /* varchar_ip */ , path /* varchar_path */ , call_svr_nm /* varchar_호출_서버_명 */ , enc_cert_key /* varchar_암호화_인증_키 */ , cert_k /* varchar_인증_키 */ , cert_st_dt /* varchar_인증_시작_일자 */ , cert_ed_dt /* varchar_인증_종료_일자 */ , send_wrk_path /* varchar_송신_작업_경로 */ , recv_wrk_path /* varchar_수신_작업_경로 */ , send_path /* varchar_송신_경로 */ , recv_path /* varchar_수신_경로 */ , id /* varchar_ID */ , enc_pwd /* varchar_암호화_비밀번호 */ , use_yn /* varchar_사용_여부 */ , note /* text_비고 */ , reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ ) select #{hst_note} as hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , api_id as api_id /* varchar_API_ID */ , api_tp as api_tp /* varchar_API_타입 */ , api_nm as api_nm /* varchar_API_이름 */ , api_desc as api_desc /* text_API_설명 */ , host as host /* varchar_host */ , ip as ip /* varchar_ip */ , path as path /* varchar_path */ , call_svr_nm as call_svr_nm /* varchar_호출_서버_명 */ , enc_cert_key as enc_cert_key /* varchar_암호화_인증_키 */ , cert_k as cert_k /* varchar_인증_키 */ , cert_st_dt as cert_st_dt /* varchar_인증_시작_일자 */ , cert_ed_dt as cert_ed_dt /* varchar_인증_종료_일자 */ , send_wrk_path as send_wrk_path /* varchar_송신_작업_경로 */ , recv_wrk_path as recv_wrk_path /* varchar_수신_작업_경로 */ , send_path as send_path /* varchar_송신_경로 */ , recv_path as recv_path /* varchar_수신_경로 */ , id as id /* varchar_ID */ , enc_pwd as enc_pwd /* varchar_암호화_비밀번호 */ , use_yn as use_yn /* varchar_사용_여부 */ , note as note /* text_비고 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ from api /* API */ where 1=1 and api_id = #{api_id} /* varchar_API_ID */

insert /* BackUpDao.backupBat */ into bat_h /* 배치_변경이력 */ ( hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , bat_svr /* varchar_배치_서버 */ , bat_id /* varchar_배치_ID */ , bat_nm /* varchar_배치_명 */ , bat_desc /* varchar_배치_설명 */ , bat_agent /* varchar_배치_에이전트 */ , bat_sch /* varchar_배치_스케쥴 */ , use_yn /* varchar_사용_여부 */ , exe_stp /* varchar_실행_단계 */ , bsc_prm /* text_기본_파라미터 */ , note /* text_비고 */ , reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ ) select #{hst_note} as hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , bat_svr as bat_svr /* varchar_배치_서버 */ , bat_id as bat_id /* varchar_배치_ID */ , bat_nm as bat_nm /* varchar_배치_명 */ , bat_desc as bat_desc /* varchar_배치_설명 */ , bat_agent as bat_agent /* varchar_배치_에이전트 */ , bat_sch as bat_sch /* varchar_배치_스케쥴 */ , use_yn as use_yn /* varchar_사용_여부 */ , exe_stp as exe_stp /* varchar_실행_단계 */ , bsc_prm as bsc_prm /* text_기본_파라미터 */ , note as note /* text_비고 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ from bat /* 배치 */ where 1=1 and bat_svr = #{bat_svr} /* varchar_배치_서버 */ and bat_id = #{bat_id} /* varchar_배치_ID */

insert /* BackUpDao.backupUsr */ into usr_h /* 사용자_변경이력 */ ( hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , usr_sq /* numeric_사용자_순번 */ , usr_id /* varchar_사용자_ID */ , enc_usr_pwd /* varchar_암호화_사용자_비밀번호 */ , usr_cls_cd /* varchar_사용자_구분_코드 */ , pwd_chg_dt /* varchar_비밀번호_변경_일자 */ , pwd_expr_dt /* varchar_비밀번호_만료_일자 */ , reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ ) select #{hst_note} as hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , usr_sq as usr_sq /* numeric_사용자_순번 */ , usr_id as usr_id /* varchar_사용자_ID */ , enc_usr_pwd as enc_usr_pwd /* varchar_암호화_사용자_비밀번호 */ , usr_cls_cd as usr_cls_cd /* varchar_사용자_구분_코드 */ , pwd_chg_dt as pwd_chg_dt /* varchar_비밀번호_변경_일자 */ , pwd_expr_dt as pwd_expr_dt /* varchar_비밀번호_만료_일자 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ from usr /* 사용자 */ where 1=1 and usr_sq = cast(#{usr_sq} as numeric) /* numeric_사용자_순번 */

insert /* BackUpDao.backupUsrInfo */ into usr_info_h /* 사용자_정보_변경이력 */ ( hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , usr_sq /* numeric_사용자_순번 */ , usr_nm /* varchar_사용자_이름 */ , enc_usr_phn_no /* varchar_암호화_사용자_전화_번호 */ , enc_usr_email /* varchar_암호화_사용자_이메일 */ , reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ ) select #{hst_note} as hst_note /* text_이력_비고 */ , usr_sq as usr_sq /* numeric_사용자_순번 */ , usr_nm as usr_nm /* varchar_사용자_이름 */ , enc_usr_phn_no as enc_usr_phn_no /* varchar_암호화_사용자_전화_번호 */ , enc_usr_email as enc_usr_email /* varchar_암호화_사용자_이메일 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp_등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp_수정_일시 */ from usr_info /* 사용자_정보 */ where 1=1 and usr_sq = cast(#{usr_sq} as numeric) /* numeric_사용자_순번 */
